extendedInfo.description: FEATURED BY HOWARD STERN, JAY LENO, FOX, ABC, NBC, TODAY SHOW, DAILY MAIL, AND THE MIKE O'MEARA SHOW!NOW OVER 5,000,00 USERS!Do you ever wonder if you're ugly and your friends just don't tell you? Do you have an ugly friend, and you just don't know how to tell them?The Ugly Meter takes your photo and scans the details of your face to give you a rating of 1-10 on the Ugly Scale.If you rate a 10, you probably have a face that only a mother could love. Depending on how bad your rating is, the Ugly Meter will comment on your looks!Who's the hottest? Now you can find out.

reviews.title: Works fine for me
reviews.comment: I read ALL the reviews posted; now come on it\'s something you buy for fun. I agree it needs front face camera, and Facebook link would be cool! Can\'t complaint about my score bring 2; in every picture taken. LOL \330\252
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Goofy.
reviews.comment: Does what it says. Not a single force close. 1 stars are morons. What do u expect for 99 cents? A console game?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun App
reviews.comment: Sure, this app could use some improvement such as front facing camera. But, really, super low rating for $1 app that get you so much fun with friends
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: Totally a waste if money! The way it works is amazing, it doesn\'t work well at all. Who is the idiot, the developer or me for buying it?.....and the ugly jokes are so funny I always forget to laugh.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Inexpensive fun party application. Scale should be reversed with 0 being ugly and 10 being hot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Random and flips pic to side every time
reviews.comment: I have a samsung fascinate. I found that the app gives completely random results. I scored anywhere from .6 to 9. I have had the same completely random result for other people including what we consider \"hot Hollywood stars\". It is just a scam for money and just a randomizer with results.It is just for fun, but that being said I feel like a fool for paying for this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Front camera
reviews.comment: Would be cool if it had front camera support
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy s3 CM10
reviews.comment: Squeezes the picture so you always fail. Be ready to hit refund.
reviews.author: Adam Robinson

reviews.title: FAKE APP
reviews.comment: This app is a knock off from the one shown on on Howard Stern!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Do not buy
reviews.comment: Horrible app. Waste of money. NOT the one advertised on Howard Stern. Does not work and does not give you any of the info the real app does.
reviews.author: Nathanial Dorn

reviews.title: Fake
reviews.comment: This is not the original one seen and heard on howard stern or tv SCAM!
reviews.author: Teresa Theres

reviews.comment: Fun (when it works) but bugged. 50% of the time it locks up loading the camera then camera becomes inaccessible. Have to force close the app. And to every one posting what do you expect for .99 cent... A working app that\'s what! It should be free. Hell, I have tons of free apps that work, all the time.
reviews.author: Brian Morano

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: It really sucks and for some reason the camara is upside down! Gonna delete right now!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad news
reviews.comment: Score of 1 or 10 states ur ugly... just a scam to get ur $$$
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: do not buy
reviews.comment: Sucks worked for 1 day and then quit will not open  very unsatisfied
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: New version much better
reviews.comment: Annoying that the result box covers the picture and needs front camera support, but much better than the first two versions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Average. Front facing camera support it\'s needed. Also fancier animation when analysing and link to Facebook.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I like
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too simple
reviews.comment: Kind like a magic 8 ball
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Should be free
reviews.comment: This isn\'t the one that was on Howard Stern and all the scores are generated randomly. This app should be free. But it\'s still fun to use with friends until they figure out it\'s fake.
reviews.author: Graham Green
